name: Elegant social media UI design - Animated and functional
description:
This is an elegant design of a social media app,


The goal was to make a premium-feeling social media platform where people can schedule to meet with each other and make squads aka favorite people, when they do this, they can see the stories of their favorite people in the dropdown.


I have used the post design from my other project named "Instagram redesign" highly recommended, do check out.


Please support my designs, trying to showcase my creativity.
